awd_titl_txt: CISE Instrumentation Grant:  An Integrated Symbolic & SignalProcessing Workstation for Research in Signal Analysis,     Machine Perception and Computer Architecture
awd_abstract_narration: A Lisp Workstation will be provided for researchers at Ohio State               University                                                                      for research in the Department of Electrical Engineering.                                                                                                       This equipment is provided under the Instrumentation Grants for                 Research in Computer and Information Science and Engineering program.                                                                                           The research for which the equipment is to be used will be in the areas         of Signal Analysis, Machine Perception and Computer Architecture
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Computer and Information Science and Engineering

inst.inst_name: Ohio State University Research Foundation -DO NOT USE
